name: DevOps engineer
description:
Bwloto is an Icelandic company with Software development hubs in Iceland and Belgrade, Serbia and a presence in Macedonia and Bosnia. The purpose of Bwloto is to provide expert services and products to the regulated lottery and gaming markets, globally.

Vision

The vision of the company is "Embrace technology, innovate and have fun". Bwloto's approach to accomplish its vision is to empower talented and skilled people, and nurture a place where they can grow and enjoy themselves. We also strive to help people achieve good work-life balance by providing good benefits and competitive compensations.

Responsibilities:

As a DevOps Engineer, you will:

  • Design, implement, and maintain scalable infrastructure on AWS

  • Deploy and manage containerized applications using Kubernetes

  • Automate infrastructure provisioning and configuration using Terraform

  • Develop and maintain CI/CD pipelines for continuous delivery

  • Monitor and optimize system performance, availability, and security

  • Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure smooth operations

Requirements:

  • Experience as a DevOps engineer or in a similar software engineering role

  • Extensive experience with AWS, Kubernetes, and Terraform

  • Proficient in managing cloud-based environments on AWS

  • Strong understanding of containerization and orchestration using Kubernetes

  • Expertise in infrastructure automation using Terraform

  • Solid knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and configuration management tools

  • Experience with monitoring and logging tools such as Prometheus, ELK, or Splunk

  • Familiarity with scripting languages such as Bash or Python

  • Ability to troubleshoot and resolve issues efficiently

Terms:

  • Flexible location - Office or home office

  • Help with relocation

  • Flexible working hours

  • 30 days vacation per calendar year

  • Personal and professional development

  • Training and education
